modName: UNP UNPB BBP Ancient Nordic Rags
summary: A modified version of the Ancient Nordic Armor for the female UNP body. It\'s a weighted separate craftable enchantable upgradable light armor with a total 50 base armor rating. Made to replace the default starting Aela armor.
descriptionHtml:
A modified version of the Ancient Nordic Armor for the female UNP body. It\'s a weighted separate craftable enchantable upgradable light armor with a total 50 base armor rating. Made to replace the default starting Aela armor but this modification is not included or it could override your already modded Aela. Craft it and give it to her if you want.

Only female meshes are included so if you equip it on a male character you will get the default ancient nordic armor meshes and the circlet will clip a bit.
It\'s a female armor only. You can use it with khajits and argonian females too.
For the circlet i have recycled the same texture of the armor. The arms and legs warmers are not a part of the cuirass, they are attached to the gauntlets and the boots armor pieces.

To install uncompress the file in your skyrim data folder and check the esp in the launcher.

To craft Smithing Forge => Leather. You will need iron ingots, leather, leather strips and linen.
author: nevenbridge
